column2: gg <- ggplot(data = acm_ventil$var$eta2, aes(x = !!sym("Dim 1"), y = !!sym("Dim 2"), label = rownames(acm_ventil$var$eta2), text = rownames(acm_ventil$var$eta2))) +
geom_text_repel(aes(label = rownames(acm_ventil$var$eta2)), size = 3) +  # Añadir las etiquetas
